description: Cathy Doherty, 52, was found dead at a property on Meols Cop Road, Southport on 26 February.
title: Family tribute to 'fun-loving' woman found dead
title_page: Family tribute to 'fun-loving' woman found dead - BBC News
maintext:
The family of a woman found dead at property in Southport said she will be "greatly missed".
Cathy Doherty, 52, was discovered at a home on Meols Cop Road, Southport on 26 February.
Two men arrested on suspicion of murder on Friday have been conditionally bailed, Merseyside Police.
In a tribute her family said: "We are all devastated by the loss of our sister Cathy.
